gmc_hdfs.replicationsimulator

Class ReplicationManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • gmc_hdfs.replicationsimulator.ReplicationManager

  • public class ReplicationManager
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is a component which handle replication work. It contained a thread namely ReplicationMonitor that is executed periodically. According to the present situation which is obtained from the namenodes of each data center, it is assumed as a replication and executed by commands to the namenodes. Number of replicas and placement are determined in this class. You have to write Replication algorithm in this class

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      Daemon replicationThread
      It is a thread for running the replication algorithm which is referred to the ReplicationManager class.
